title: Foundational Information Literacy Training for Vocational Trainees

context.prior_knowledge: Basic smartphone usage and online search experience
context.additional_context: One-time educational sessions conducted in smartphone-centered limited technological environments. Emphasizing information collection and analysis skills for project-based assessments

learning_goals: Students can evaluate credible information from libraries and online sources using three or more criteria.
Students can apply at least two information retrieval strategies using smartphones.
Students can distinguish and identify three or more primary/secondary sources relevant to project topics.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
